hero.title: Launch Your Token on Axiome
hero.subtitle: AI-powered token studio, auto-generated landing pages, real-time analytics, and risk scoring — all in one cosmic platform.

studio.title: AI Token Studio
studio.description: Describe your idea and get complete tokenomics, descriptions, FAQ, and launch plan generated by AI.

landing.title: Auto Landing Pages
landing.description: Get a beautiful project page instantly. Show tokenomics, links, and on-chain metrics — no coding required.

explorer.title: Explorer & Ratings
explorer.description: Discover new tokens with risk scoring. See activity, holder distribution, and warning flags at a glance.

cta.title: Ready to Launch?
cta.subtitle: Join the Axiome ecosystem. Create your token project in minutes with AI assistance.

studio.title: Token Studio

form.title: Tell us about your token
form.description: Fill in the details and our AI will generate descriptions, tokenomics, and more.

form.utilitiesPlaceholder: What can holders do with your token? Staking, governance, discounts...

createToken.title: Ready to create your token?

connect.description: Connect your Axiome wallet to view your balance, send tokens, and manage your assets.

swap.title: Swap Tokens
swap.comingSoonDesc: Token swapping will be available soon. You'll be able to exchange AXM for any token directly in your wallet.
